actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Shippensburg Public Library, the Ousterhout Library, the West Pittston Library, the West Shore Public Library, the West Shore Public Library, the Milton Public Library, and the Himmelreich Library, and certain units of local government

summary.text: Relieves certain Pennsylvania libraries of liability for allegedly wrongful payments by the Federal Disaster Assistance Administration.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Shippensburg Public Library, the Ousterhout Library, the West Pittston Library, the West Shore Public Library, the West Shore Public Library, the Milton Public Library, and the Himmelreich Library, and certain units of local government
